entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ComInterfaceGenerator uses Diagnostic in incremental pipeline, which do not compare as equal in Roslyn #86736
  • NativeAOT stripped symbol files aren't loaded automatically in MacOS+lldb #86734
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2 fails with simple MAUI application #86727
  • Unable to TarFile.ExtractToDirectoryAsync when it contains symbolic link file points to an absolute path #86724
  • [API Proposal]: Create an AsnReader from an AsnReader #86723
    Future
  • ILLink Trim Analyzer not warning for TryAddSingleton #86720
    8.0.0
  • Frozen Collection Follow-up: Items/Keys/Values properties #86719
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient may retry non-idempotent requests on gracefully closed connections #86714
  • Regression in .NET 8.0-preview.5: dependent assembly is not included in TPA list when running fxdependent pwsh build with preview.5 dotnet.exe #86713
  • JIT: Handle liveness for defined retbufs in physical promotion #86711
    Future
  • [wasm][jiterpreter] memory access out of bounds when running with Profiled AOT + Jiterpreter #86710
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT produces very large `__LINKEDIT` segment on macOS #86707
  • Simple .NET 7 Api is using more than 1.5Gigs of memory for Apple Mac Mini Arm 64 processor #86703
  • Topological Sort in S.T.J source generator not correct #86702
    8.0.0
  • QUIC Listener ConnectionOptionsCallback ALPN Narrowing Down Failure with Wrong Error Code #86701
    8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement collation native functions #86699
  • DefaultMeterFactory.Create and MeterOptions.Scope #86684
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Recognized internal namespace #86682
  • support file block copy on write on Windows #86681
    8.0.0

Closed

  • COM interface derivation chain for 3+ interfaces doesn't generate shadowing and vtables correctly #86662
    8.0.0
  • ReadOnlySequence GetPosition does not respect slice boundaries #86509
  • ComInterfaceGenerator does not support by-value In and Out attributes for unmanaged-to-managed stubs #86608
  • PreserializedResourceWriterTests.TestResourceManagerIsSafeForConcurrentAccessAndEnumeration test failure #86013
    8.0.0
  • UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping escapes too much #86463
  • UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzerTests fail on some Mono runtimes #69823
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Further optimizations for dedup improvement #83973
    8.0.0
  • Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Boolean.TryParse #78408
  • [wasm] System.Memory tests failing with AOT running on V8 - `RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds` at `corlib_wrapper_delegate_invoke_System_Func_2_T_REF_TResult_REF_invoke_callvirt_TResult_T_T_REF ` #86621
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Avoid generating rgctx fetch trampolines in generic sharing #82906
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tracking: iOS - Size reduction #61815
    8.0.0
  • [mono] iOS - Size reduction: many more corelib symbols are materialized/AOT compiled in netcore compared to legacy Mono #56385
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Cryptography, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3 a' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified. #86693
  • MakeGenericXXX apis don't check for function pointers #86628
    8.0.0
  • Remove GT_ASG nodes #10873
    Future
  • ValueTaskSourceAsTask IAsyncStateMachineBox implementation? #77866
    Future
  • CA1861 skip cases where the array is mutated later #86414
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Define the managed dependencies of the crossgen-corelib.proj file through ProjectReferences #86735
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2187689 #86733
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add some more testing around shadowing, inheritance, and project boundaries. #86732
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Fix StringMarshalling error message and actually copy attributes from methods to shadows #86731
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.* to Aspnet Transport package #86730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make helix-inner-step send job warnaserror the same between windows and non-windows platforms #86729
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expand CORINFO_HELP_CHKCASTANY cast #86728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.* to Aspnet Transport package #86725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [WIP][Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add IsEmpty and Length properties to System.BinaryData #86721
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6 #86717
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add adjacency row length check in System.Text.Json Topological Sort #86716
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP/1.1 concurrent request content read race condition #86715
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Update NativeAot with latest ILLink changes #86712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview5] [mono][wasm] Fix support for virtual invokes. #86709
    Servicing-approved
  • [7.0] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86708
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Have physical promotion insert read backs before possible implicit control flow #86706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ISA outerloop tests #86705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization unblocking APIs that became supported. #86694
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use globalization invariant mode + prefer speed for AOT compilers #86691
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement resource lookup in satellite assemblies #86689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI: specify BaseOS for the unknown rid build. #86688
    blocked, community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Only build specific tracing tests for NativeAOT leg #86697
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Exports cleanup #86718
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement byval-out marshalling for unmanaged->managed #86666
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix timeouts in resourcemanager test #86680
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Use the BannedApiAnalyzer instead of the LinqPoison mechanism to ban Linq in the managed type system #86673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary closure in ServiceProviderEngineScope.CaptureDisposable #86683
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete native AOT interop doc #86704
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Print detailed comments for emitIns_R_AI in asm (targeting NativeAOT) #86677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocation in Activity.{Parent}Id #86685
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Unify Roslyn testing SDK version across the repo #86669
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Added float32 support and implemented all R4 opcodes #86092
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on iOS #86583
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono][wasm] Fix support for virtual invokes. #86687
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix MakeGenericType/Method argument validation for function pointers #86686
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Follow related intervals for single-reg LIR temp intervals #86632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a bug in type hierarchy marking in the trimmer #86635
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • add nuget.projectmodel to version.details #86650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization

Updated

  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add `DiagnosticOr<T>` type for gracefully handling failures in incremental generator transformations #86603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Guarded devirtualization: multiple type checks #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Handle event pipe environment variable configuration and output to file #86656
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Adjust physical promotion heuristics #86660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Bump main version to Preview 6 #86675
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `u8` literals in `ManagedTextSection`. #86657
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix crashing bug in StringDecoder.decode when accessing SharedArrayBuffer from different JavaScript realm #86664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [browser] threads & js cleanup #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use cinv and cneg instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Add a simple store-forwarding optimization for structs returned in registers #86388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Preference LIR edges away from killed registers #81242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add newly introduced modifiers to our csharp_preferred_modifier_order editorconfig #86668
    area-Meta
  • Implement `ToggleBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add get AppContext properties diagnostic IPC command #86610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Temporary exclude infinite tests. #86515
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
